title: Non-'Thrones' HBO Content and a Conversation With David Cross | The Watch
description:
On the night that “Battle of Winterfell” aired, it was ‘Barry’ that contained the best action sequence (1:00). The final season of ‘Veep’ seems like it might be falling victim to Thronesian pacing (13:30). Plus, a conversation with David Cross ahead of the premiere of his stand-up special, ‘Oh Come On’ (31:03).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Alison Herman and David Cross

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
